Title: Donald Trump wants a Golden Dome; this company could win big
Body:

Title: Northrop Grumman Corporation (NOC) Boosts Quarterly Dividend by 12.1%
Body:
In This Article:
On May 20, Northrop Grumman Corporation (NYSE:NOC) declared that it is increasing its quarterly dividend by 12.1% to $2.31 per share.
